# Payments â€“ Regulatory Constraints

## Mandatory Constraints
- AML and sanctions screening must be enforced where applicable.
- Payment traceability must be preserved end-to-end.
- Regulatory reporting inputs must be accurate and complete.

## Compliance Expectations
- Deterministic payment processing
- Explicit error and rejection handling
- Complete audit trail for each payment

## Forbidden
- Bypassing mandatory compliance checks
- Non-traceable payment execution
- Undocumented reversals or corrections
